catalog_script_client.name: remove html bar

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_78b95332978031106cf971371153af3d
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="MSIX Builder">71186b2f975f6d106cf971371153af0a</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>remove html bar</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {


   var sheet = window.document.styleSheets[0];


   sheet.insertRule('.mce-toolbar-grp,.mce-statusbar { display: none !important; }', sheet.cssRules.length);


   sheet.addRule('.mce-toolbar-grp,.mce-statusbar', 'display: none !important;', -1); // IE likes to be different


}

]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-19 13:11:51</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>78b95332978031106cf971371153af3d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>remove html bar</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Capture" source="x_685788_test2">67338c24272ea510724cb0b5c1519811</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Capture">67338c24272ea510724cb0b5c1519811</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_78b95332978031106cf971371153af3d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-19 14:09:29</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
